A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was absolutely stunning and a breath of fresh air for the franchise as a whole. Rian took some risks with this one and they surely paid off in my book\, but many apparently do not share my view. I am not here to knock anyone else's opinion but please see this film for yourself and not miss out based off someone else's negativity! Overall I laughed\, I cried\, I had goosebumps\, and I surely didn't know what was going to happen next!! Very well could be the best film in the saga\, don't miss out!
